response.original_title: AJR: Live from the Hollywood Bowl
response.overview: Step inside AJR’s spectacular Somewhere in the Sky Tour as their sold-out performance from the iconic Hollywood Bowl comes to life in this special livestream event. Filmed under the open Los Angeles sky, the show captures the band’s signature fusion of theatrical production, inventive visuals, and emotionally charged alt-pop anthems, all amplified by the magic of one of the world’s most legendary venues.  Join Adam, Jack, and Ryan for a night packed with soaring new songs, bold reimaginations of fan favorites, and the playful storytelling that transforms every AJR show into an immersive experience. From towering stage design and surreal digital moments to intimate conversations with the crowd, this Hollywood Bowl performance stands as one of the band’s most ambitious and heartfelt milestones.  Whether you’re tuning in for the first time or reliving the night, this livestream gives you a front-row vantage point to AJR’s unforgettable, sky-high celebration.
response.title: AJR: Live from the Hollywood Bowl
